assignments.description: Assigning the patientBooleanVar as to the value from the Verify Emergency Contact screen.

assignments.description: Assigning the updated progress note record.

assignments.description: Assigning the patientBooleanVar as checked to be used in the verifyEmergencyContactandAddress Update Records element.

decisions.description: Deciding if the check box for 'Two patient identifiers have been stated by the patient/contact' is checked on the verification screen.
decisions.name: Is_Two_Patient_Identifiers_already_checked_on_the_Progress_Note
decisions.label: Is Two Patient Identifiers already checked on the Progress Note?

decisions.description: Determining if the Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient field has been completed.
decisions.name: Was_Caller_Recipient_Relation_to_Patient_filled_in
decisions.label: Was Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient filled in?

Flow.description:
Subflow for the VCC_Sign_Note_with_Callouts_2 to Update VCV Progress Note Records that are missing verifications.
Release 1.11.0: CCCM-32494 - Removed VA Identity. Retrieved Place of Birth - City, Place of Birth - State and Mother's Maiden Name from Account. Updated formBlankPlaceOfBirthCityAndState as well as Mother's Maiden Name on the screen component.
Release 1.12.0: CCCM-31700 - Added Current Patient Care Facility to Patient Verification Screen. VCC_Caller_Name_Text__c added to VerifyEmergencyContact Screen Element.
Release 1.15.0: CCCM-35068 - Added Preferred Name and Pronoun to the verify screen.
Release 1.20.1: CCCM-42876 - Updated error messages to be 508 compliant

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient Picklist Choice Set
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Caller_Recipient_Relation_to_Patient_Picklist_Choice_Set

formulas.description: Acknowledge Checkbox field value true if VCC_Caller_Recipient_Verified__c and VCC_Emergency_Contact_Info_Verified__c and VCC_Current_Address_Phone_Verified__c are true.
formulas.name: acknowledgeCheckBox_value

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Branch of Service field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankBranchOfService

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the military service number field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankMilitaryServiceNumber

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Date of Birth field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankPatientDOB

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Patient Name field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankPatientName

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Patient Primary Address field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankPatientPrimaryAddress

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Patient Primary Mobile Phone field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankPatientPrimaryMobilePhone

formulas.description: This formula field inserts a break if there is no data returned for the Patient Primary Phone. This maintains the formatting if no data is returned for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankPatientPrimaryPhone

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Patient SSN field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankPatientSSN

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Patient Birth Place field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankPlaceOfBirthCityAndState

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Service Dates field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankServiceDates

formulas.description: This formula inserts a line break if there's no data returned for the Patient Spouse Name field. This maintains the formatting for the Sign Note screen.
formulas.name: formBlankSpouseName

formulas.description: Checking if the VCC_Verified_Patient_Identifiers field on the Progress Note is checked.
formulas.name: patientIdentifierIsChecked

fields.name: CallerRecipient_Blank_Important_Message
fields.fieldText: Important! You may not sign this Progress Note with a blank value in the "Caller Recipient/Relation to Patient" field. Please update your selection to proceed.

fields.name: VerifyEmergencyContactPhoneandAddress
fields.fieldText: Verify Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient, Emergency Contact, Current Location and Call Back Number

fields.name: patientCareFacility
fields.fieldText:
Current Patient Care Facility

{!progressNote.VCC_Current_Patient_Care_Facility__c}

fields.name: militaryServiceNumberDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Military Service Number

{!formBlankMilitaryServiceNumber}

fields.name: mothersMaidenNameDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Mother's Maiden Name

{!getRelatedAccountFields.Mother_s_Maiden_Name__pc}

fields.fieldText:
Next of Kin

{!getRelatedAccountFields.VCC_Next_of_Kin__pc}

fields.name: If_Other_Describe_Relation_to_Patient
fields.fieldText: If Other Describe Relation to Patient

validationRule.errorMessage: Text for If Other Describe Relation to Patient is too long. Please limit the text to 80 characters or less.
Text for Caller Name is too long. Please limit the text to 50 characters or less.
Text is too long for Emergency Contact. Please limit text to 254 characters or less.
The Emergency Contact Phone Number is too long. Please limit phone number to 40 digits or less.

fields.name: currentAddressText
fields.helpText: Current location of patient, if different from Primary Address

fields.name: currentPhoneText
fields.helpText: Current location of patient, if different from Primary Address

validationRule.errorMessage: The Call Back Number is too long. Please limit phone number to 40 digits or less.

fields.name: acknowledgeCheckBox
fields.fieldText: I acknowledge that I have verified the Caller/Recipient Relation to Patient, Emergency Contact Information, Current Location and Call Back Number
fields.helpText: All three corresponding checkboxes on the progress note need to be selected OR select this checkbox to confirm all three.

fields.name: PatientIdentifierCheckbox
fields.fieldText: Two patient identifiers have been stated by the patient/contact
fields.helpText: Patient must be verified with their full name and at least two of the following: SSN, military service number, branch of service, service dates, date of birth, place of birth, home address, spouse’s name, mother's maiden name, or next of kin.

variables.description: Storing the branch of service from the MPI callout into this variable.
variables.name: branchOfService
